snippet: New York's Metropolitan Transportation Authority passed a 5-year investment program with a $15.2 billion shortfall on Wednesday, and its chief executive said it may take years before the agency secures full funding....

headline.print_headline: NYC Transportation Plan May Not Be Funded for Years: Official
headline.main: NYC Transportation Plan May Not Be Funded for Years: Official

lead_paragraph: New York's Metropolitan Transportation Authority passed a 5-year investment program with a $15.2 billion shortfall on Wednesday, and its chief executive said it may take years before the agency secures full funding.
